content.text:
# List of people of the Three Kingdoms (E)

The following is a partial list of people significant to the Three Kingdoms period (220–280) of Chinese history. Their romanised names start with the letter E.
E
{|class="wikitable sortable"
|-
! Name !! Courtesy name !! Birthyear !! Deathyear !! Ancestral home(present-day location) !! Role !! Allegiance !! Previous allegiance(s) !! Notes
|-
|Ehe俄何||||||||||General||Qiang|| ||
|-
|Erchan兒禪||||||||||Tribal leader||Dingling||||
|-
|Erxiaode兒孝德||||||||||Politician||Han dynasty||||
|-
|Erxun兒尋||||||||||||Cao Wei||||
|-
|Ezhesai蛾遮塞||||||||||General||Qiang|| ||
|-
|}
References
* Fan, Ye. Book of the Later Han (Houhanshu).
* Chen, Shou. Records of the Three Kingdoms (Sanguozhi).
* Fang, Xuanling. Book of Jin (Jin Shu).
* Pei, Songzhi. Annotations to Records of the Three Kingdoms (Sanguozhi zhu).
* Sima, Guang. Zizhi Tongjian.
